title: AMERICA
synopsis: The film follows the journey of two to freedom, full of daydreaming, and set against the backdrop of woods, bonfires, and open skies.

title: AMERICA
synopsis: A story that questions the relevance of many of America’s social and economic mistakes and questions the intentions of Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton in its fight to restore an America of several centuries ago.

title: AMERICA
synopsis: The story revolves around former food writer, Jane Stern, and how she conquered clinical depression after becoming a paramedic.

title: AMÉRICA
synopsis: A 2009 English language drama film directed by Yves Simoneau, starring Philip Johnson, Rosie O’Donnell and Ruby Dee. It has been nominated for 2 awards.

title: AMÉRICA
synopsis: An ambulance drives into an enclosed area, surrounded by barbed fences and watch towers, and parks next to a small group of children, their schoolmaster, and a Nazi guard. A Nazi soldier exits the vehicle, and with an eerie smile, surveys the group.

title: AMER
synopsis: A vertiginous dive in the heart of Arizona, meeting the inhabitants of a small town crossing Route 66. They are the heirs of the American dream and give us their hopes and their fears, when the States United States will elect their new president.

title: AMER
synopsis: América is a story of brothers confronting the chasm between adolescent yearning and adult realities when brought together to care for their ailing ninety-three year old grandmother.

title: AMENTIA
synopsis: The zany crew of a New York cable TV station accidentally bounce a signal off the moon, bringing them worldwide attention.

title: AMENITIES
synopsis: A film made entirely with typewriter ribbon.

title: AMEN.
synopsis: Ana is confronted to body and desire at three key moments of her life. Her carnal search sways between reality and colored fantasies, becoming more and more oppressive. A black laced hand prevents her from screaming.

title: AMEN!
synopsis: In September 1923 a “red” uprising in Bulgaria is crushed and drowned in blood. A year and a half later a bomb planted by left-wing terrorists explodes in the St Nedelya Church in Sofia where the cream of society has gathered.

title: AMEN!
synopsis: The second film from trilogy The Optical Illusion.

title: AMEN
synopsis: A contractor taking measurements of a client’s house has an unusual intimate encounter.

title: AMEN
synopsis: A 2012 German language animated film directed by Moritz Mayerhofer. The film screened at DOK Leipzig in 2013.

title: AMEN
synopsis: During WWII SS officer Kurt Gerstein tries to inform Pope Pius XII about Jews being sent to concentration camps. Young Jesuit priest Riccardo Fontana gives him a hand.

title: AMELIE'S TRIP
synopsis: A short film by Khavn.

title: AMELIE OR THE TIME TO LOVE
synopsis: The story revolves around the lives of few people around an ancient Syrian Church.

title: AMELIE OR THE TIME TO LOVE
synopsis: Kim Ki-duk shot Amen entirely in Europe, His camera follows the bizarre, disturbing journey of a young Korean girl who comes to Europe to search for someone she has to follow to Venice and Avignon.

title: AMELIA'S CLOSET
synopsis: A young man wants to bring his father’s body back to their hometown. It is a journey that brings an unexpected response from others.

title: AMELIA LÓPES O'NEILL
synopsis: When Amélie arrives in Paris to live with her Aunt Elisa, she meets Pierre, a young actor who is keen to find out more about her and discover why she is so melancholic.

title: AMELIA EARHART: THE FINAL FLIGHT
synopsis: A 1974 French language drama film written and directed by Daniel Duval, starring Louise Chevalier, Stéphane Bouy and Stéphane Bouy. The film screened at International Film Festival Rotterdam in 1974.

title: AMELIA EARHART
synopsis: For young Amelia, empowering herself will mean coming clean with what she’s hiding in her closet.

title: AMELIA EARHART
synopsis: Bursting with imagination and having seen her fair share of tragedy and fantasy, Amelie (Audrey Tautou) is not like any other girl. As she grows up, she becomes a waitress in a Montmartre bar. One day, Amelie discovers that her goal in life is to fix up other people’s troubles.

title: AMERICAN CINEMA
synopsis: A well-bred young woman, who prizes the virtue of fidelity, remains faithful to the doctor who deflowers her, even after he marries her invalid sister.

title: AMERICAN CHINATOWN
synopsis: A telling of the story of the famous U.S. aviatrix Amelia Earhart who attempted to fly solo around the world in 1937. She disappeared during the process.

title: AMERICAN CHINATOWN
synopsis: The life of aviatrix Amelia Earhart until her disappearance in 1937.

title: AMERICAN CHAOS
synopsis: An ode to Kodachrome, its inventers, its historic usage and its signature colour palette in the days of its obsolescence.

title: AMERICAN CASINO
synopsis: The history of Hollywood and filmmaking comes alive in this spectacular nine hour celebration of movie magic. Includes interviews with Robert Altman, Clint Eastwood, Harrison Ford, Spike Lee, George Lucas, Sidney Lumet, Julia Roberts, Martin Scorsese, Gene Siskel and Steven Spielberg.

title: AMERICAN CASINO
synopsis: A sect of the Triads controls the streets of Chinatown led by tough fighter Yong. But things get complicated when Lily, the adopted sister of Triads boss Eric, arrives on the scene. Yong is torn between his love for Lily and his commitment to uphold the Triads’ honor.

title: AMERICAN CANNIBAL
synopsis: Determined to chart his own path in life, American-born college student Sureel upsets his traditional Indian parents. The young music major resorts keeps his choice of studies — and social activities — a secret from his father.

title: AMERICAN BURGER
synopsis: Starting six months before the 2016 presidential election, director Jim Stern put his life on hold and — driven to understand what seemed incomprehensible at the time— traveled through red states to interview and spend time with Donald Trump supporters from different backgrounds.

title: AMERICAN BUFFALO
synopsis: Leslie Cockburn directs this documentary that delves into the Wall Street collapse of 2008 and captures the devastating effects the white collar-created catastrophe have on the blue-collar citizens of America.

title: AMERICAN BRAWLER
synopsis: The tale of the dying American art of the Sideshow.

title: AMERICAN BRAWLER
synopsis: When documentarians Perry Grebin and Michael Nigro begin following TV writers Gil S. Ripley and Dave Roberts, the two are trying to launch a Comedy Central pilot.

title: AMERICAN BORN
synopsis: A bus load of American students, all jocks, cheerleaders and nerds, are on a culture trip in Europe when they stumble upon a mysterious Hamburger stand in the deep European woods, selling 100% American Burgers. A visit to the Burger Factory behind the stand renders them trapped in unknown territory.

title: AMERICAN BOMBER
synopsis: Long-repressed feelings of bitterness and betrayal explode when three inner-city losers plot the robbery of a valuable coin in a seedy second-hand junk shop.

title: AMERICAN BEER
synopsis: A martial arts instructor must enter the world of illegal pit fighting in order to save his family and his dojo.

title: AMERICAN BEAUTY
synopsis: In 1978, Scorsese decided to get together with a few friends and make a film record of some of Steven Prince’s autobiographical stories. The resulting movie, is a simple project, but actually falls right in line with themes and interests common in much of his work.

title: AMERICAN BEAUTY
synopsis: Teenager Sally Boy’s (Andrew Zeller) obsession with old-school gangster films proves dangerous when, after his father is found mysteriously murdered, he decides to take matters into his own hands and exact revenge on the perpetrators.

title: AMERICAN BANDITS: FRANK AND JESSE JAMES
synopsis: A disgraced ex-soldier travels to New York City to become the first American born and raised suicide bomber, but an unexpected relationship complicates his plan.

title: AMERICAN BALLET THEATRE: THE DREAM
synopsis: Scott Urquhart, C. Adam Leigh, Jordan Kawchuk and Jason Thompson play four Canadian friends who set out on a road trip to the West Coast of the United States.

title: AMERICAN BALLET THEATRE NOW
synopsis: In this Academy Award-winning parable about the dysfunctional life of a seemingly perfect suburban family, complications arise when the father starts to develop feelings for his teenage daughter’s cheerleader best friend.

title: AMERICAN BALLET THEATRE IN SWAN LAKE
synopsis: Jesse James, his brother Frank and their outlaw buddies are hurting and on the run from U.S. Marshal Kane in writer-director Fred Olen Ray’s grizzled and earnest tribute to the celebrated outlaw legend.

title: AMERICAN BALLET THEATRE IN SAN FRANCISCO
synopsis: What happens when six lucky strangers from all over the world, win a random contest – an all expenses paid trip to an amazing beach house in glamorous Malibu, California, thanks to a big Internet company – only to discover they have to share it with each other.

title: AMERICAN BALLET THEATRE AT THE MET: MIXED BILL
synopsis: The American Ballet Theatre showcases some of the best selections from its impressive repertoire in this stirring performance that includes “Sleeping Beauty,” “Swan Lake” and the world debut of Nacho Duato’s “Remanso.”

title: AMERICAN BALLET THEATRE AT THE MET: MIXED BILL
synopsis: Choreographed by Frederick Ashton in honor of William Shakespeare’s 400th birthday, this magical production — based on the Bard’s play “A Midsummer Night’s Dream” — features Felix Mendelssohn’s famed score and sublime sets that add to the charm.

title: AMERICAN BABYLON
synopsis: Caroline Kennedy introduces this memorable production of Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky’s most popular classical ballet, recorded at the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts in Washington, D.C.

title: AMERICAN BABYLON
synopsis: The American Ballet Theater dances some pieces at the War Memorial Opera House, in San Francisco, such as Paul Taylor’s “Airs”, two pas-de-deux – the Black Swan duet from the third act of “Swan Lake”, performed by Fernando Bujones and Cynthia Gregory; and Sir Kenneth MacMillan’s Romeo and Juliet.

title: AMERICAN BABYLON
synopsis: Witness three wonderful ballets performed live on stage at the Metropolitan Opera House in New York City. “Sylphides” stars legend Mikhail Baryshnikov, “Sylvia” features a lovely duet and “Paquita” is full of energetic Spanish-style choreography.

title: AMERICAN BABYLON
synopsis: A 1987 English language drama/erotica film written and directed by Roger Watkins, starring Michael Gaunt, Chelsea Blake and Bobby Astyr.
